info.title: goose-track-REST-API
info.description: The API for the Goose Track application.

post.description: Email must be verify. Token active for 1 hour and refreshToken active for 2 hours.
This can only be done by registered user and after verify email. Token active for 1 hour. RefreshToken active for 3 days.
